lines.gurmukhi: inj Gr myro swDsMgiq nwrd muin drsn swDsMg myro inj rUp hY
lines.transliteration_english: Nij Ghar Mayro Saadhasangati Naarad Mouni , Darasan Saadhasang Mayro Nij Roop Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Lord (Bhagwan) tells sage Narad, 0 dear devotee! Congregation of Guru-conscious and true people is my abode if company is my glimpse.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMig myro mwqw ipqw Aau kutMb sKw swDsMig myro suqu sRyst AnUpu hY
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangi Mayro Maataa Pitaa Au Koutanb Sakhaa , Saadhasangi Mayro Soutu Sraysat Anoopu Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Company of godlike people of the True Guru is like my friends and whole family. The company of true is my beautiful and supreme son.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMg srb inDwnu pRwn jIvn mY swDsMig inju pd syvw dIp DUp hY
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasang Sarab Nidhaanu Praan Jeevan Mai , Saadhasangi Niju Pad Sayvaa Deep Dhoop Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Congregation is a treasure-house of all comforts and happiness. It is my life-support. Congregation of true people is means of gaining higher spiritual state. It is also a place of performing service which is true worship.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMig rMg rs Bog suK shj mY swDsMig soBw Aiq aupmw Aau aUp hY ]303]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangi Rang Ras Bhog Soukh Sahaj Mai , Saadhasangi Sobhaa Ati Oupamaa Au Oop Hai ?303?

Shabad OS B.translation: Company of Guru beloveds is a place of relishing the elixir of Naam Simran and enjoying spiritual peace. The glory and grandeur of the holy congregation is beyond praise unique and wondrous. (303)
